author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam Savage sits down with Ben Burtt, the man behind the iconic sounds of Star Wars. Here's where that R2 scream came from!

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom
title: R2D2's Scream Is Really This #starwars #adamsavage

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
We had the rare opportunity to sit down with James Cameron, director of some of the most important and successful films of all time, to talk about his passion for 3D filmmaking, the future of watching movies, and the immersive content he's creating in a partnership with Meta!

Watch the trailer of Avatar: Fire and Ash in Quest headsets: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/event/1882710282285285/
Try Hyperscape Capture Beta: https://www.meta.com/experiences/meta-horizon-hyperscape-capture-beta/8798130056953686/
Hands-On with Meta Ray-Ban Display Smart Glasses: https://youtu.be/1jDorDsi9JM

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks
Additional media courtesy of Meta

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join
Tested and Adam Savage Ts, stickers, (de) merit bad
title: James Cameron's Theory of 3D Cinema
